trans-unit.source: Provides data for the <xref href="System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticationService.Authenticating"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: 에 대 한 데이터를 제공는 <xref href="System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticationService.Authenticating"> </xref> 이벤트입니다.

trans-unit.source: You create a handler for the <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticationService.Authenticating> event when you want to customize how the user's credentials are authenticated at run time.
trans-unit.target: 에 대 한 처리기를 만들면는 <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticationService.Authenticating>이벤트를 런타임 시 사용자의 자격 증명의 인증 방법을 사용자 지정할 수 있습니다.</xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticationService.Authenticating>

trans-unit.source: The AuthenticatingEventArgs class supplies values to any <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticationService.Authenticating> event handler.
trans-unit.target: 모든 값을 제공 하는 AuthenticatingEventArgs 클래스 <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticationService.Authenticating>이벤트 처리기.</xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticationService.Authenticating>

trans-unit.source: By using the properties available in this class, you can retrieve the user credentials to customize authentication.
trans-unit.target: 이 클래스에서 사용할 수 있는 속성을 사용 하 여 인증을 사용자 지정 하려면 사용자 자격 증명을 검색할 수 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticationService> class raises the <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticationService.Authenticating> event before validating the user credentials.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticationService>발생 시키는 클래스는 <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticationService.Authenticating>이벤트는 사용자 자격 증명을 검증 하십시오.</xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticationService.Authenticating> </xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticationService>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticationService> class constructs an instance of the AuthenticatingEventArgs object and passes it to any <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticationService.Authenticating> event handler.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticationService>클래스 AuthenticatingEventArgs 개체의 인스턴스를 생성 하 고 모든 전달 <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticationService.Authenticating>이벤트 처리기.</xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticationService.Authenticating> </xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticationService>

trans-unit.source: You can use the <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticatingEventArgs.UserName%2A>, <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticatingEventArgs.Password%2A> and <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticatingEventArgs.CustomCredential%2A> properties to retrieve the user credentials.
trans-unit.target: 사용할 수는 <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticatingEventArgs.UserName%2A>, <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticatingEventArgs.Password%2A>및 <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticatingEventArgs.CustomCredential%2A>사용자 자격 증명을 검색할 속성.</xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticatingEventArgs.CustomCredential%2A> </xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticatingEventArgs.Password%2A> </xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticatingEventArgs.UserName%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticatingEventArgs.CustomCredential%2A> property can contain additional values that are required for authentication, such as an identification number.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticatingEventArgs.CustomCredential%2A>속성 id 번호 등의 인증에 필요한 추가 값을 포함할 수 있습니다.</xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticatingEventArgs.CustomCredential%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticatingEventArgs.Authenticated%2A> property indicates whether the user credentials are valid.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticatingEventArgs.Authenticated%2A>속성 사용자 자격 증명이 유효한 지 여부를 나타냅니다.</xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticatingEventArgs.Authenticated%2A>

trans-unit.source: You set the <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticatingEventArgs.Authenticated%2A> property to the result of your customized authentication.
trans-unit.target: 설정한는 <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticatingEventArgs.Authenticated%2A>속성 사용자 지정된 인증의 결과로.</xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticatingEventArgs.Authenticated%2A>

trans-unit.source: In addition, you set the <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticatingEventArgs.AuthenticationIsComplete%2A> property to `true` if you have checked the user credentials and do not want the <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticationService> class to check user credentials through the default membership provider.
trans-unit.target: 또한 설정는 <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticatingEventArgs.AuthenticationIsComplete%2A>속성을 `true` 사용자 자격 증명을 얻게 하 고 원하지 않는 경우는 <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticationService>클래스를 기본 멤버 자격 공급자를 통해 사용자 자격 증명을 확인 합니다.</xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticationService> </xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticatingEventArgs.AuthenticationIsComplete%2A>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the user credentials are valid.
trans-unit.target: 사용자 자격 증명이 유효한 지 여부를 나타내는 값을 가져오거나 설정 합니다.

trans-unit.source: If you authenticate user credentials in an event handler for the <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticationService.Authenticating> event, set the Authenticated property to indicate whether the user credentials are valid.
trans-unit.target: 에 대 한 이벤트 처리기에서 사용자 자격 증명을 인증 하는 경우는 <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticationService.Authenticating>이벤트, 사용자 자격 증명이 유효한 지 여부를 나타내기 위해 인증 된 속성을 설정 합니다.</xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticationService.Authenticating>

trans-unit.source: If the user credentials are valid and no additional validation is needed, set Authenticated to `true` and <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticatingEventArgs.AuthenticationIsComplete%2A> to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 사용자 자격 증명이 유효 하는 경우 추가 유효성 검사 없이 필요한로 인증 된 설정 `true` 및 <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticatingEventArgs.AuthenticationIsComplete%2A>를 `true`.</xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticatingEventArgs.AuthenticationIsComplete%2A>

trans-unit.source: You set the <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticatingEventArgs.AuthenticationIsComplete%2A> property to indicate that the authentication service should bypass the default steps for authenticating a user.
trans-unit.target: 설정한는 <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticatingEventArgs.AuthenticationIsComplete%2A>인증 서비스 기본값을 무시 해야 나타내는 속성을 사용자를 인증 하기 위한 단계.</xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticatingEventArgs.AuthenticationIsComplete%2A>

trans-unit.source: The value in Authenticated is used by the <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticationService> class only if <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticatingEventArgs.AuthenticationIsComplete%2A> is set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 인증 된 값이 사용은 <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticationService>경우에만 클래스 <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticatingEventArgs.AuthenticationIsComplete%2A>로 설정 되어 `true`.</xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticatingEventArgs.AuthenticationIsComplete%2A> </xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticationService>

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticatingEventArgs.AuthenticationIsComplete%2A> is `false`, the <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticationService> class calls the default membership provider to validate user credentials, and then overwrites the value in Authenticated.
trans-unit.target: 경우 <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticatingEventArgs.AuthenticationIsComplete%2A>은 `false`, <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticationService>클래스는 사용자 자격 증명의 유효성을 검사 하는 기본 멤버 자격 공급자를 호출 하 고 다음 인증 된에서 값을 덮어씁니다.</xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticationService> </xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticatingEventArgs.AuthenticationIsComplete%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the user credentials are valid; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>사용자 자격 증명이 잘못 되었습니다. 그렇지 않으면 <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the user credentials have been authenticated.
trans-unit.target: 사용자 자격 증명 인증 되었는지 여부를 나타내는 값을 가져오거나 설정 합니다.

trans-unit.source: You can set the AuthenticationIsComplete property to indicate whether the <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticationService> class must authenticate the user credentials.
trans-unit.target: 나타내는 AuthenticationIsComplete 속성을 설정할 수 있는지 여부를 <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticationService>클래스는 사용자 자격 증명을 인증 해야 합니다.</xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticationService>

trans-unit.source: If AuthenticationIsComplete is `true`, the <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticationService> class does not validate the user credentials through the default membership provider.
trans-unit.target: AuthenticationIsComplete 이면 `true`, <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticationService>클래스 기본 멤버 자격 공급자를 통해 사용자 자격 증명을 확인 하지 않습니다.</xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticationService>

trans-unit.source: Instead, it uses the value in <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticatingEventArgs.Authenticated%2A> to determine whether to create an authentication cookie.
trans-unit.target: 대신,의 값을 사용 <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticatingEventArgs.Authenticated%2A>인증 쿠키를 만들 것인지 결정 합니다.</xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticatingEventArgs.Authenticated%2A>

trans-unit.source: If AuthenticationIsComplete is `false`, the <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticationService> class validates the user credentials through the default membership provider and overwrites the value in the <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticatingEventArgs.Authenticated%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: AuthenticationIsComplete 이면 `false`, <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticationService>클래스 기본 멤버 자격 공급자를 통해 사용자 자격 증명의 유효성을 검사 하 고에 값을 덮어쓰게는 <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticatingEventArgs.Authenticated%2A>속성.</xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticatingEventArgs.Authenticated%2A> </xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticationService>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if all the steps for validating the user credentials have been performed; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>사용자 자격 증명 유효성 검사를 위한 모든 단계가 수행 되었으면; 그렇지 않으면 <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets additional user values for authentication.
trans-unit.target: 인증에 대 한 추가 사용자 값을 가져옵니다.

trans-unit.source: You can use the CustomCredential property to retrieve authentication values other than user name and password during the <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticationService.Authenticating> event.
trans-unit.target: CustomCredential 속성을 사용 하 여 사용자 이름 및 암호 중 이외의 인증 값을 검색 하는 <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticationService.Authenticating>이벤트.</xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticationService.Authenticating>

trans-unit.source: For example, an application might be configured to validate an identification number together with the user name and password.
trans-unit.target: 예를 들어, 사용자 이름 및 암호와 함께 id 번호 유효성을 검사 하는 응용 프로그램을 구성할 수 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: In that case, the identification number will be passed in the `CustomCredential` parameter of the <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticationService.Login%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Id 번호에 전달할 경우에 `CustomCredential` 의 매개 변수는 <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticationService.Login%2A>메서드.</xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticationService.Login%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can then retrieve the custom value through the CustomCredential property.
trans-unit.target: 그런 다음 CustomCredential 속성을 통해 사용자 지정 값을 검색할 수 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: The CustomCredential property contains the customized values in the same format as they are passed to the <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticationService.Login%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: CustomCredential 속성에 전달 되는 동일한 형식의 사용자 지정 된 값이 포함 되어는 <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticationService.Login%2A>메서드.</xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticationService.Login%2A>

trans-unit.source: In the <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticationService.Authenticating> event handler, if more than one value is stored in the property, you must parse the value of the CustomCredential property to retrieve the values.
trans-unit.target: 에 <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticationService.Authenticating>둘 이상의 값이 속성에 저장 되는 경우 이벤트 처리기, 값을 검색할 CustomCredential 속성의 값을 구문 분석 해야 합니다.</xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticationService.Authenticating>

trans-unit.source: The values required for authentication other than user name and password.
trans-unit.target: 사용자 이름 및 암호 이외에 인증에 필요한 값입니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets the password for the user.
trans-unit.target: 사용자에 대 한 암호를 가져옵니다.

trans-unit.source: You use the Password property to retrieve the password during the <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticationService.Authenticating> event.
trans-unit.target: Password 속성을 사용 하 여 동안 암호를 검색 하는 <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticationService.Authenticating>이벤트.</xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticationService.Authenticating>

trans-unit.source: The password to validate.
trans-unit.target: 유효성을 검사할 암호입니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets the authentication name for the user.
trans-unit.target: 사용자에 대 한 인증 이름을 가져옵니다.

trans-unit.source: You use the UserName property to retrieve the authentication name during the <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticationService.Authenticating> event.
trans-unit.target: UserName 속성을 사용 하 여는 동안 인증 이름을 검색 하는 <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticationService.Authenticating>이벤트.</xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticationService.Authenticating>

trans-unit.source: The user name to validate.
trans-unit.target: 유효성을 검사할 사용자 이름입니다.
